item.title: Prejudice is Alive and Well in 2011...Unfortunately
item.description: Author: Randy Clark I was enjoying a pleasant experience at a suburban men’s clothing store the other day. My sales person, John was enthusiastically taking my money and I was excited about the clothing he had up-sold me. I only went in for a shirt…the alterations on my new sport coat and 2 pair of slacks would be ready in 2 days. John was interrupted by another salesperson,”He doesn’t want me to wait on him.
